SELECT *
FROM ( SELECT boardId AS 'id', userId, lawFirmId, title, content, writer, writeDt, postType, commentCount, recommendCount, `view`, report, 0 as `type`, status FROM BoardTb WHERE userId = #{userId} and status = 1
and (title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
UNION ALL
SELECT trialId AS 'id', userId, lawFirmId, title, content, writer, writeDt, postType, commentCount, recommendCount, `view`, report, 1 as `type`, status FROM TrialTb WHERE userId = #{userId} and (status = 1 or status = 3 or status = 4)
and (title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
) A ORDER BY writeDt DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
